heading: HR00873
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF
TRANSPORTATION (DOTr), SEC. ARTHUR P. TUGADE, TO ESTABLISH RULES
STRICTLY REQUIRING ALL COMMON CARRIERS INVOLVED IN INTER-ISLAND
TRANSPORT OF PASSENGERS BY LAND, WATER, OR AIR, TO PREPARE AND
RECORD DETAILED SEAT PLANS OF THEIR PASSENGERS DURING THE ENTIRE
COURSE OF TRANSIT
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2020-05-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00873
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr), SEC. ARTHUR P. TUGADE, TO ESTABLISH RULES STRICTLY REQUIRING ALL COMMON CARRIERS INVOLVED IN INTER-ISLAND TRANSPORT OF PASSENGERS BY LAND, WATER, OR AIR, TO PREPARE AND RECORD DETAILED SEAT PLANS OF THEIR PASSENGERS DURING THE ENTIRE COURSE OF TRANSIT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GASATAYA, GREG G.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2020-05-18
